title: Congregational dua during Friday Khutbah & After Friday Prayer - Assim al hakeem
transcript: after from india what's the ruling on congregational dua after the friday prayer congregational dua during the khutbah the sermon itself when the imam on the pulpit says oh allah he not doesn't raise his hands because it's a so he just says oh allah forgive the muslims who have died or allah cured their illness and everybody says i mean this is totally legit after concluding the prayer the congregational dua that some imams do and everybody in the congregation says i mean the raiser hand this is an innovation and not permissible
